name: tableView(_:namesOfPromisedFilesDroppedAtDestination:forDraggedRowsWith:)
desc: Returns an array of filenames that represent the indexSet rows for a drag to dropDestination.
declaration:
optional func tableView(_ tableView: NSTableView, 
namesOfPromisedFilesDroppedAtDestination dropDestination: URL, 
     forDraggedRowsWith indexSet: IndexSet) -> [String]
